issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing using KitchenSink, specifically Base UI>Views>WebView Controls, I navigated away from the Google page loaded at the start of the test. Clicking the "reload" button loaded the Google page again instead of reloading the page I was on.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KitchenSink 1.7.0 on the Verizon iPhone 4
2) Choose Base UI>Views>WebView Controls
3) When the page has loaded, choose any link on the page
4) Click the "reload" button at the bottom of the page

Result:
The main Google page loads and displays

Expected Result:
The page you navigated to should reload and display

Notes:
Does not occur with KS 1.6.2
fields.summary: iOS: Webview reload button loads original Google page even if navigated away from that page.
fields.environment: iPhone4 Verizon (4.2.7), all supported ios devices tested,  Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 00:38 f8dfdf7...), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201104280957

comments.body: Tested with iPhone 4, iOS 4.3.3, KS build 1.7.0.879871b, could not reproduce. Closing.
Witnessed today with iPhone 4s (iOS 5.0) and SDK 1.7.4.v20111021181815. Reopening. Did not occur with iPod Touch 3rd gen (iOS 4.0.2).
Need to test and ensure that this is still valid.
Cannot reproduce. Tested on iPhone Simulator running 5.0 and iPhone4 running 5.0.1 with Titanium SDK version=1.8.0.1 timestamp=12/06/11 10:26 githash=d54627f
closing as we are not able to reproduce using master (1.9.0 Feb 9 2012 09:46 rd47ce8a4)
